metadata.inclusion:
To add the product to the system, please follow the following steps. 
1. Start the COQON App 
2. Select "Device" then "Settings" and tap on "+" to add your Window Sensor 
3. Select COQON 
4. Follow the steps in the App
metadata.exclusion: To remove your device from the system, please start the exclusion process to exclude the device from the COQON App. The device will be reset.
metadata.reset:
Factory reset: 

1. Remove battery 
2. Hold the Tamper
3. Insert Battery 
4. Release Tamper within 5 sec. 

Note: Please use this procedure only when the primary controller is missing or inoperable!
